Text:
Arthur is a 2011 comedy film written by Peter Baynham and directed by Jason Winer. The film is a remake of the 1981 film of the same name written and directed by Steve Gordon. It stars Russell Brand in the title role, and Helen Mirren, Jennifer Garner, Greta Gerwig, and Nick Nolte with supporting roles.

Plot

A boozy playboy rascal named Arthur Bach (Russell Brand) is set to inherit a $950 million fortune if he marries an heiress, Susan Johnson (Jennifer Garner), who his mother Vivienne (Geraldine James) thinks will make something out of him. However, he falls in love with Naomi Quinn (Greta Gerwig) and turns to his nanny Hobson (Helen Mirren) for help when he is made to choose between money and love.

Note : colours improved with more stable picture beside a little flashing on the picture background but not affecting the viewing , it was the best possible work for this cam under the circunstances .
